description: Upgrade your jacket potato with this middle eastern inspired baked sweet potato, a perfect light dinner served with a side salad.
keywords: Jacket potato,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free
name: Jacket Sweet Potatoes with Chickpeas, Tahini & Mint Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Brush the sweet potatoes with 2 teaspoons of oil and roast flesh side down on a baking tray for 15 minutes.
Mix the chickpeas, remaining oil, garlic, cumin and smoked paprika in a large bowl and add to the baking tray with the potatoes, roasting for a further 25 minutes, shaking the tray halfway through.
Whisk together the tahini and lemon juice with a teaspoon or two of water in a small bowl.
Place two sweet potato halves on each plate, top with chickpeas, tahini dressing and torn mint leaves and serve.
